name: org.openrewrite.java.struts.MigrateStrutsDtd
displayName: Migrate DTD to a specific Struts version
description: Update Struts DTD to reflect the specified version.
category3Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.

name: org.openrewrite.java.struts.migrate6.MigrateDateTagFormat
displayName: Migrate Struts date tag format patterns
description: Converts SimpleDateFormat patterns in `<s:date>` tags to DateTimeFormatter-compatible patterns. Struts 6.0 uses DateTimeFormatter instead of SimpleDateFormat, which has different pattern letter meanings.
category1Description: Migrate to Struts 6.0. The full migration guide can be found [here](https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/WW/Struts+2.5+to+6.0.0+migration#Struts2.5to6.0.0migration-Staticmethodsaccess).
category3Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.

name: org.openrewrite.java.struts.migrate6.MigrateDynamicMethodInvocation
displayName: Migrate Dynamic Method Invocation to explicit action mappings
description: Identifies Struts configurations using Dynamic Method Invocation (DMI) and marks them for migration, as DMI is disabled by default in Struts 6 for security reasons.
category1Description: Migrate to Struts 6.0. The full migration guide can be found [here](https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/WW/Struts+2.5+to+6.0.0+migration#Struts2.5to6.0.0migration-Staticmethodsaccess).
category3Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.

name: org.openrewrite.java.struts.migrate6.MigrateInterceptorDisabledParam
description: Rename the `validation.excludeMethods` interceptor param to `validation.disabled` for Struts 6 compatibility.
category1Description: Migrate to Struts 6.0. The full migration guide can be found [here](https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/WW/Struts+2.5+to+6.0.0+migration#Struts2.5to6.0.0migration-Staticmethodsaccess).
category3Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.

name: org.openrewrite.java.struts.migrate6.MigrateTilesListener
description: Update `org.apache.tiles.web.startup.TilesListener` to `org.apache.struts2.tiles.StrutsTilesListener` in web.xml for Struts 6 compatibility.
category1Description: Migrate to Struts 6.0. The full migration guide can be found [here](https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/WW/Struts+2.5+to+6.0.0+migration#Struts2.5to6.0.0migration-Staticmethodsaccess).
category3Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.

name: org.openrewrite.java.struts.migrate6.MigrateValidatorDtd
description: Update xwork-validator DTD from 1.0.3 to 1.0.4 for Struts 6 compatibility.
category1Description: Migrate to Struts 6.0. The full migration guide can be found [here](https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/WW/Struts+2.5+to+6.0.0+migration#Struts2.5to6.0.0migration-Staticmethodsaccess).
category3Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.

name: org.openrewrite.java.struts.migrate6.MigrateStaticOgnlMethodAccess
displayName: Migrate static OGNL method access to action wrapper methods
description: Migrates OGNL expressions using static method access (e.g., `@com.app.Util@makeCode()`) to use action wrapper methods instead. Static method access is disabled by default in Struts 6 for security reasons.
category1Description: Migrate to Struts 6.0. The full migration guide can be found [here](https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/WW/Struts+2.5+to+6.0.0+migration#Struts2.5to6.0.0migration-Staticmethodsaccess).
category3Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.

name: org.openrewrite.java.struts.migrate6.MigrateStruts6
category1Description: Migrate to Struts 6.0. The full migration guide can be found [here](https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/WW/Struts+2.5+to+6.0.0+migration#Struts2.5to6.0.0migration-Staticmethodsaccess).
category3Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.

name: org.openrewrite.java.struts.migrate6.UpgradeStruts6Dependencies
category1Description: Migrate to Struts 6.0. The full migration guide can be found [here](https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/WW/Struts+2.5+to+6.0.0+migration#Struts2.5to6.0.0migration-Staticmethodsaccess).
category3Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.

name: org.openrewrite.java.struts.migrate6.MigrateStruts6Constants
description: All Xwork constants had been already deprecated, with this version all of them have been removed and Struts constants have been used instead.
category1Description: Migrate to Struts 6.0. The full migration guide can be found [here](https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/WW/Struts+2.5+to+6.0.0+migration#Struts2.5to6.0.0migration-Staticmethodsaccess).
category3Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.

name: org.openrewrite.java.struts.migrate6.MigrateAwareInterfaces
displayName: Migrate Struts 2.0 interceptors to action "aware" interfaces
description: These types have moved to a new package in Struts 6.0 and their methods have been renamed from set* to with*.
category1Description: Migrate to Struts 6.0. The full migration guide can be found [here](https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/WW/Struts+2.5+to+6.0.0+migration#Struts2.5to6.0.0migration-Staticmethodsaccess).
category3Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.

name: org.openrewrite.java.struts.migrate6.MigrateOpenSymphonyClasses
description: Migrate classes from `com.opensymphony.xwork2` to their replacements in `org.apache.struts2`.
category1Description: Migrate to Struts 6.0. The full migration guide can be found [here](https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/WW/Struts+2.5+to+6.0.0+migration#Struts2.5to6.0.0migration-Staticmethodsaccess).
category3Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.

name: org.openrewrite.java.struts.migrate6.RemoveFreemarkerHtmlBuiltin
description: Removes the deprecated `?html` built-in from Freemarker templates. After migrating to Struts 6 with the latest Freemarker (which enables auto-escaping by default), the `?html` built-in is no longer needed and should be removed. See the [Struts 2.5 to 6.0 migration guide](https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/WW/Struts+2.5+to+6.0.0+migration#Struts2.5to6.0.0migration-Tagescapebehaviour).
category1Description: Migrate to Struts 6.0. The full migration guide can be found [here](https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/WW/Struts+2.5+to+6.0.0+migration#Struts2.5to6.0.0migration-Staticmethodsaccess).
category3Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.

name: org.openrewrite.java.struts.search.FindStaticOgnlMethodAccess
description: Find OGNL expressions that use static method access (e.g., `@com.app.Util@makeCode()`), which is disabled by default in Struts 6 for security reasons. These expressions need to be migrated to use action instance methods instead.
category3Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.

name: org.openrewrite.java.struts.search.FindStrutsXml
description: Struts XML files may have any name, and may be outside a resources directory, so the true test is to look at the content of the file.
category3Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.

displayName: Rename OpenSymphony / XWork classes to Struts 7 packages

category3Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.
